raw_response.output_text:
{"image_analysis": "This is a military service record from the Batalhão Limeirense (Limeira Battalion) from Limeira, State of São Paulo. The document is formatted as a personnel identification card with physical description fields. A central black and white photograph of a male subject (approximately 4 x 5 inches) is positioned in the middle of the form, wearing what appears to be military headwear. The left side contains handwritten entries for physical characteristics (height, hair color/form, beard, mustache, name). The right side lists facial features (eyes, mouth, face shape, nose, identifying marks). At the bottom of the form are signature lines for six official positions: Presidente da Commissão, Vice Presidente, Secretário, Prefeito, Delegado de Policia, and Instrutor. Reference marks appear in the top corners: '6,23' and '9/19' in the upper left, and what appears to be '164' in the upper right. parsed.image_analysis: This is a military service record from the Batalhão Limeirense (Limeira Battalion) from Limeira, State of São Paulo. The document is formatted as a personnel identification card with physical description fields. A central black and white photograph of a male subject (approximately 4 x 5 inches) is positioned in the middle of the form, wearing what appears to be military headwear. The left side contains handwritten entries for physical characteristics (height, hair color/form, beard, mustache, name). The right side lists facial features (eyes, mouth, face shape, nose, identifying marks). At the bottom of the form are signature lines for six official positions: Presidente da Commissão, Vice Presidente, Secretário, Prefeito, Delegado de Policia, and Instrutor. Reference marks appear in the top corners: '6,23' and '9/19' in the upper left, and what appears to be '164' in the upper right. Page numbers are not present as header/footer elements.
